description: Both Azerbaijan's second city and the capital of the breakaway region come under heavy fire.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Major cities hit as heavy fighting continues
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Major cities hit as heavy fighting continues - BBC News
maintext: There are fears that the actual death toll among the militaries from all sides as well as civilians could be much higher, as casualty claims have not been independently verified.
